body.p: The playbooks address a disaster recovery scenario where you have lost your entire cluster and all the VMs. Other scenarios and how to handle them are described in the Docker documentation including the following scenarios:

ul.li: You have lost one UCP instance but your cluster still has the quorum. The easiest way is to recreate the missing UCP instance from scratch.
You have lost the quorum in your UCP cluster but there is still one UCP instance running
You have lost one instance of DTR but still have a quorum of replicas. The easiest way is to recreate the missing DTR instance from scratch.
You have lost the quorum of your DTR cluster but still have one DTR instance running.
